statement.p: What is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements; round accordingly.

solution.p: The percent is the number in parentheses (0.9715). The increase is the amount less than 100. In this case that is \displaystyle{1}-{0.9715}={0.0285}. Converted to percent notation this is \displaystyle{100}{\left({0.0285}\right)}={2.85}\%.
